org.hbr.session.store

Class MongoStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleBase
      • org.apache.catalina.session.StoreBase
        • org.hbr.session.store.MongoStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.catalina.Lifecycle, org.apache.catalina.Store

    public class MongoStore
extends org.apache.catalina.session.StoreBase
    Tomcat Store implementation backed by MongoDB.
    Author:
    Kevin Davis

        See Also:

      • sessionDataProperty

        protected static final String sessionDataProperty
        Property used to store the Session's data.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • sessionCollectionName

        protected static final String sessionCollectionName
        Default Name of the Collection where the Sessions will be stored.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • info

        protected static final String info
        The descriptive information about this implementation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • storeName

        protected static String storeName
        Name to register for this Store, used for logging.

      • threadName

        protected String threadName
        Name to register for the background thread.

      • connectionUri

        protected String connectionUri
        MongoDB Connection URI. This will override all other connection settings specified. For more information, please see http://api.mongodb.org/java/current/com/mongodb/MongoClientURI.html
        See Also:
        MongoClientURI

      • hosts

        protected String hosts
        MongoDB Hosts. This can be a single host or a comma separated list using a [host:port] format. Lists are typically used for replica sets. This value is ignored if the dbConnectionUri is provided. 

                        127.0.0.1:27001,127.0.0.1:27002

      • dbName

        protected String dbName
        Name of the MongoDB Database to use.

      • collectionName

        protected String collectionName
        Name of the MongoDB Collection to store the sessions. Defaults to tomcat.sessions

      • username

        protected String username
        MongoDB User. Used if MongoDB is in Secure mode.

      • password

        protected String password
        MongoDB password. Used if MongoDB is in Secure mode

      • connectionTimeoutMs

        protected int connectionTimeoutMs
        Connection Timeout in milliseconds. Defaults to 0, or no timeout

      • connectionWaitTimeoutMs

        protected int connectionWaitTimeoutMs
        Connection Wait Timeout in milliseconds. Defaults to 0, or no timeout

      • minPoolSize

        protected int minPoolSize
        Minimum Number of connections the MongoClient will manage. Defaults to 10.

      • maxPoolSize

        protected int maxPoolSize
        Maximum Number of connections the MongoClient will manage. Defaults to 20

      • replicaSet

        protected String replicaSet
        MongoDB replica set name.

      • useSecureConnection

        protected boolean useSecureConnection
        Controls if the MongoClient will use SSL. Defaults to false.

      • useSlaves

        protected boolean useSlaves
        Controls if the MongoClient will write to slaves. Equivalent to slaveOk. Defaults to false.

      • writeConcern

        protected com.mongodb.WriteConcern writeConcern
        Controls what WriteConcern the MongoClient will use. Defaults to "SAFE"

      • timeToLive

        protected int timeToLive
        Controls how long the sessions live in the DB. Defaults to -1 or forever

      • mongoClient

        protected com.mongodb.MongoClient mongoClient
        MongoClient instance to use.

      • db

        protected com.mongodb.DB db
        Mongo DB reference

      • collection

        protected com.mongodb.DBCollection collection
        Mongo Collection for the Sessions
